lines.text: I'll get out if I hafta kill every screw in the joint!
So, how tough are you, babe?
Ain't there a rule against talking in this young ladies riding academy?
An army couldn't get you out of that courthouse. A lot of guys have tried it and they've all been buried.
You're the only guy I ever met that gave me a break without putting the bee on me for dough.
You're a blind, stupid, selfish, contemptible, tinhorn crook.
Imagine Stacey workin' for the cops? That's a hot one.
Wait a minute! What do I gotta do, fight my way back in?
I don't love life much, but I don't hate it enough to stick my head in front of a screw's bullet.
